
in winter they lift their bare branches in supplication towards heaven

# BITSY VERSION 4.8

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

NAME branchend3
DLG ITM_4

DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
"""
{sequence
  - they had shed their leaves and discarded their sins
}
"""

DLG ITM_2
the wind, blowing

DLG ITM_3
tangled fingers grasping fruitlessly. the fruit was stolen by the blackbird, the seeds are dispersed,scattered

DLG ITM_4
they look so vulnerable in their nakedness, awaiting their green summer robes. it will be a long five months

DLG ITM_5
"""
{sequence
  - all i hear are the rooks indulging in coarse bloviation
  - the fire of autumn extinguished and only brown remains
  - try not to mourn, try not to mourn, they will grow back
}
"""

DLG ITM_1
wooden skeletons carved by time

END 0


END undefined
it is important to remember that winter doesn't always kill
